name: Turtle Men Leather Wallets
description:
Crafted from soft leather, this black wallet from turtle is fabulously stylish and well organized. This two-fold wallet has lots of inner storage making it perfect for everyday use

Zippered chamber

Do not machine wash
Rub surface with dry clean cloth to remove dust and dirt

name: M tv Men My Fab Eyewear Black Sunglasses
description:
Hot, hip and happening - brand MTV has caught the nerve of the new generation like no other. This MTV eyewear is desgned to make one stand out in a crowd and is fashioned to dress those who wear their appetite to win up their sleeves.

This set of glasses comes in a sturdy fiber case with felt lining for easy and delicate storage.

Fitted with shatterproof polycarbonate lenses that filter out 100% UVA and UVB rays
Suitable wear for average sunlight conditions
Stylised metal frame in a classic design with rectangular lens for absolute comfort and durability
Flexible plastic nose holders to hold the glasses in place, ensuring there is no friction with the skin

Care
Remove dust and grime by gently wiping the lens with the cloth provided
Remove oil or tough stains with the help of a lens cleaner
Do not use your fingers on such stains
Do not place glasses on uneven surface or heated areas like the dashboard of a car

name: Numero Uno Men Casual Brown Slipper
description:
A reinterpretation of a classic style, this numero uno slipper is a fashion must-have. Style your look to perfection with these excellently designed slippers that ensure comfort and reflect an easy-going attitude.

Upper
Synthetic leather upper with thong straps for enhanced durability and comfort

name: Crocs Beach Unisex Pink Sandal
description:
Originally designed for boaters and fishermen to have a firm foot even on slippery surfaces, crocs has gone a long way in creating footwear for those who demand comfort to the T. Replete with several benefits such as the shoe moulding to your feet using your body heat, it's a hot favourite.

The speciality of these shoes are that they need to Fit loosely around the feet, such that neither the sides of the shoe nor the toe unit come in contact with the feet. Instead, there should be a quarter to half inch gap between the foot and the wall of the shoe, and you should be able to comfortably fit a finger between the heel and back strap.

Upper
EVA upper with textured inside for lightweight feel, comfort and durability
EVA material that moulds to the foot shape offering ample ergonomic comfort
Perforations on the forefoot for ventilation, to drain away water and to add jibbitz
Back strap to support the ankle and hold the foot in place
Upper moulded to midsole for comfort and protection of feet from abrasion
Broad EVA lining along the midsole for enhanced durability
Brand button on upper for style

Midsole
EVA footbed with horizontal and foot shaped lines for ergonomic comfort and acupressure
Crocs branding on the mid heel for comfort and style
Fungus, bacteria and odour resistant for a healthy wear even in wet conditions
Mild heel cup on the footbed to support the heel

Outsole
Slip resistant outsole with multi-directional textured leaf-shaped grooves in the forefoot and backfoot

Shoe care
Rub surface with clean, damp cloth to remove dust
